languages.text: Однако прошлые темные делишки Фалько не были забыты законопослушными подданными Империума. Вид преуспевающего хладного торговца, не опасающегося правосудия, вызывал ярость у людей, и вскоре почтенный торговец скончался — Миссия Касбаллики предпочла избавиться от того, кто привлекал к ней слишком много раздраженных взглядов.

But Falco's previous dirty dealings were not forgotten by the law-abiding subjects of the Imperium. The sight of the successful Cold Trader living without fear of retribution made people furious, and the esteemed merchant soon met his end. The Kasballica Mission could not suffer one so hated to live.
languages.original_text: Однако прошлые темные делишки Фалько не были забыты законопослушными подданными Империума. Вид преуспевающего хладного торговца, не опасающегося правосудия, вызывал ярость у людей, и вскоре почтенный торговец скончался — Миссия Касбаллики предпочла избавиться от того, кто привлекал к ней слишком много раздраженных взглядов.

traits.locale_text: Yet, previous Falco's dirty work was not forgotten by the law-abiding subjects of the Imperium. The sight of a prospering Cold Trader without fear of justice induced people's fury, and thus the honourable merchant passed away. Kasballica Mission decided to get rid of the one who attracted too many spiteful eyes to it.

Yet, previous Falco's dirty work was not forgotten by the law-abiding subjects of the Imperium. The sight of a prospering Cold Trader without fear of justice induced people's fury, and thus the honourable merchant passed away. Kasballica Mission decided to get rid of the one who attracted too many spiteful eyes to it.

But Falco's previous dirty dealings were not forgotten by the law-abiding subjects of the Imperium. The sight of the successful Cold Trader without fear of retribution made people furious, and the honourable merchant soon met his end. The Kasballica Mission could not suffer one who attracted so much ire to live.

But Falco's previous dirty dealings were not forgotten by the law-abiding subjects of the Imperium. The sight of the successful Cold Trader without fear of retribution made people furious, and the honourable merchant soon met his end. The Kasballica Mission could not suffer one who attracted so much ire to live.

But Falco's previous dirty dealings were not forgotten by the law-abiding subjects of the Imperium. The sight of the successful Cold Trader living without fear of retribution made people furious, and the esteemed merchant soon met his end. The Kasballica Mission could not suffer one so hated to live.

But Falco's previous dirty dealings were not forgotten by the law-abiding subjects of the Imperium. The sight of the successful Cold Trader living without fear of retribution made people furious, and the esteemed merchant soon met his end. The Kasballica Mission could not suffer one so hated to live.

languages.text: 然而，帝国守法的臣民并没有忘记法尔科曾经的肮脏勾当。当人们看到这位这位冷市商人事业越发成功，变得越来越肆无忌惮、目中无人，所有人都怒不可遏。这位受人尊敬的商人很快丧了命，因为他惹火的人实在太多了，卡斯巴利卡犯罪集团不打算让这种遭人忌恨的人继续活下去。
languages.original_text: But Falco's previous dirty dealings were not forgotten by the law-abiding subjects of the Imperium. The sight of the successful Cold Trader living without fear of retribution made people furious, and the esteemed merchant soon met his end. The Kasballica Mission could not suffer one so hated to live.

traits.locale_text: 然而，帝国守法的臣民并没有忘记法尔科曾经的肮脏勾当。当人们看到这位这位冷市商人事业越发成功，变得越来越肆无忌惮、目中无人，所有人都怒不可遏。这位可敬的商人很快丧了命，因为他惹火的人实在太多了，卡斯巴利卡犯罪集团不打算让这样的人继续活下去。

languages.text: Doch Falcos schmutzige Geschäfte wurden von den gesetzestreuen Untertanen des Imperiums nicht vergessen. Der Anblick des erfolgreichen Kalthändlers, der keinerlei Strafe fürchten musste, weckte eine gewaltige Wut in den Leuten. So fand der ehrenhafte Kaufmann bald sein Ende. Die Kasballica-Mission konnte jemanden, der so verhasst war, nicht einfach am Leben lassen.
languages.original_text: But Falco's previous dirty dealings were not forgotten by the law-abiding subjects of the Imperium. The sight of the successful Cold Trader living without fear of retribution made people furious, and the esteemed merchant soon met his end. The Kasballica Mission could not suffer one so hated to live.

traits.locale_text: Doch Falcos schmutzige Geschäfte wurden von den gesetzestreuen Untertanen des Imperiums nicht vergessen. Der Anblick des erfolgreichen Kalthändlers, der keinerlei Strafe fürchten musste, weckte eine gewaltige Wut in den Leuten. So fand der ehrenhafte Kaufmann bald sein Ende. Die Kasballica-Mission konnte jemanden, der so viel Zorn auf sich zieht, nicht einfach am Leben lassen.

languages.text: Mais les sujets respectueux des lois de l'Imperium n'oublièrent pas les malversations passées de Falco. Le succès de cet adepte du Commerce Froid qui opérait alors sans crainte de représailles rendit les gens furieux et il connut rapidement une fin tragique, commanditée par la Mission de la Kasballica qui ne pouvait supporter un individu détestant tant la vie.
languages.original_text: But Falco's previous dirty dealings were not forgotten by the law-abiding subjects of the Imperium. The sight of the successful Cold Trader living without fear of retribution made people furious, and the esteemed merchant soon met his end. The Kasballica Mission could not suffer one so hated to live.

traits.locale_text: Mais les sujets respectueux des lois de l'Imperium n'oublièrent pas les malversations passées de Falco. Le succès de cet adepte du Commerce Froid qui opérait alors sans crainte de représailles rendit les gens furieux et il connut rapidement une fin tragique, commanditée par la Mission de la Kasballica qui ne pouvait laisser vivre un individu suscitant une telle indignation.

languages.text: Pero los buenos súbditos del Imperium no olvidaron los anteriores negocios turbios de Falco. Ver al Comerciante Frío disfrutar de su éxito sin miedo a sufrir repercusiones enfureció a la gente, y el estimado mercader no tardó en llegar a su final. La misión Kasballica no podía permitir vivir a alguien tan odiado.
languages.original_text: But Falco's previous dirty dealings were not forgotten by the law-abiding subjects of the Imperium. The sight of the successful Cold Trader living without fear of retribution made people furious, and the esteemed merchant soon met his end. The Kasballica Mission could not suffer one so hated to live.

traits.locale_text: Pero los buenos súbditos del Imperium no olvidaron los anteriores negocios turbios de Falco. Ver al Comerciante Frío disfrutar de su éxito sin miedo a sufrir repercusiones enfureció a la gente, y el honrado mercader no tardó en llegar a su final. La misión Kasballica no podía permitir vivir a alguien tan odiado.

languages.text: ただ帝国の法を守る臣民たちは、かつてのファルコの汚れた取引を忘れてはいなかった。報復を恐れぬコールド・トレーダーが成功する姿は多くの人々を憤らせ、名高き商人はほどなく最期を迎えることになる。カスバリカ聖務団は、これほど憎むべき者を生かしておくわけにはいかなかった
languages.original_text: But Falco's previous dirty dealings were not forgotten by the law-abiding subjects of the Imperium. The sight of the successful Cold Trader living without fear of retribution made people furious, and the esteemed merchant soon met his end. The Kasballica Mission could not suffer one so hated to live.

traits.locale_text: ただ帝国の法を守る臣民たちは、かつてのファルコの汚れた取引を忘れてはいなかった。報復を恐れぬコールド・トレーダーが成功する姿は多くの人々を憤らせ、名高き商人はほどなく最期を迎えることになる。かほど憤慨を集める男の生き方に、カスバリカ聖務団が耐えかねたのだ。

languages.text: Ancak Falco'nun eskiden yaptığı kirli işler, İmparatorluk'un kanunlara saygılı hizmetkârları tarafından unutulmamıştı. Soğuk Tacir'in cezaya çarptırılmadan yaşaması ve başarılı olması insanları öfkelendirdi ve saygıdeğer tüccar çok geçmeden son nefesini verdi. Kasballica Misyonu, böylesine nefret edilen birinin yaşamasına müsaade edemezdi.
languages.original_text: But Falco's previous dirty dealings were not forgotten by the law-abiding subjects of the Imperium. The sight of the successful Cold Trader living without fear of retribution made people furious, and the esteemed merchant soon met his end. The Kasballica Mission could not suffer one so hated to live.

traits.locale_text: Ancak Falco'nun eskiden yaptığı kirli işler, İmparatorluk'un kanunlara saygılı hizmetkârları tarafından unutulmamıştı. Soğuk Tacir'in cezaya çarptırılmadan yaşaması ve başarılı olması insanları öfkelendirdi ve saygıdeğer tüccar çok geçmeden son nefesini verdi. Kasballica Misyonu, böylesine nefret edilen birinin yaşamasına müsaade edemezdi.
